ComicInfo.Summary:
The Pathfinder heroes struggle to escape the Hellknights’ grasp! Taken prisoner after breaching the heart of Citadel Vraid, Seoni and her friends come face-to-face with Lictor Severs DiViri, leader of the Order of the Nail. To have any chance of escaping the Hellknights’ lethal brand of “justice,” the heroes must pit their sorcery and steel against a army of hell-hardened legionnaires. Magic and mayhem blaze through this harrowing adventure from Pathfinder co-creator F. Wesley Schneider, with art from Ediano Silva .
Contains pull-out poster map and official Pathfinder RPG bonus encounter!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jonathan Lau & Omi Remalante | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano | 2 | C | Cover C | Geraldo Borges & Mohan | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Lau | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Geraldo Borges | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 6 | G/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | Andrea Mutti & Omi Remalante | 7 |
